content.content: 1. No tolls are payable on the King’s Highways that connect the highway between the easterly end of Highway 407, as defined in the Highway 407 Act, 1998, and Highway 35/115 to Highway 401 during the period from April 5, 2022 to May 31, 2023.
content.raw_html: 1. No tolls are payable on the King’s Highways that connect the highway between the easterly end of Highway 407, as defined in the Highway 407 Act, 1998, and Highway 35/115 to Highway 401 during the period from April 5, 2022 to May 31, 2023.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).   Français

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
